0:
Text: Alison, Allison or Alyson is a given name, usually a feminine name in English-speaking countries.

Triplets:<Alison Allison Alyson
1:
--------------------
Text: Alison (given name):  It was originally a medieval French nickname for "Alis", old form of Alice derived with the suffix "-on" or "-son" sometimes used in the former French nicknames such as Jeanson ("little Jean") or Pierson ("little Pierre").
Triplets:<Alison
